00030 #import "GHNSString+UIKitUtils.h"
00031 
00032 @implementation NSString (GHUIKitUtils)
00033 
00034 - (CGSize)gh_sizeWithFont:(UIFont *)font forWidth:(CGFloat)width lineGap:(CGFloat)lineGap {
00035   return [self gh_sizeWithFont:font forWidth:width lineGap:lineGap lines:nil maxLineCount:-1 truncated:nil options:0];
00036 }
00037 
00038 - (NSMutableArray *)gh_linesWithFont:(UIFont *)font forWidth:(CGFloat)width maxLineCount:(NSInteger)maxLineCount truncated:(BOOL *)truncated options:(GHNSStringSizeOptions)options {
00039   NSMutableArray *lines = nil;
00040   [self gh_sizeWithFont:font forWidth:width lineGap:0 lines:&lines maxLineCount:maxLineCount truncated:truncated options:options];
00041   return lines;
00042 }
00043 
00044 - (CGSize)gh_sizeWithFont:(UIFont *)font forWidth:(CGFloat)width lineGap:(CGFloat)lineGap 
00045                     lines:(NSMutableArray **)lines maxLineCount:(NSInteger)maxLineCount truncated:(BOOL *)truncated
00046                   options:(GHNSStringSizeOptions)options {
00047   
00048   CGFloat originX = 0;
00049   CGFloat x = originX;
00050   CGFloat y = 0;
00051   CGFloat maxLineHeight = 0;
00052   CGFloat maxLineWidth = 0;
00053   
00054   NSMutableArray *wrappedLines = [NSMutableArray array];
00055   NSMutableString *line = [NSMutableString string];
00056   if (truncated) *truncated = NO;
00057   
00058   for(NSString *word in [self gh_cutWithCharacterFromSet:[NSCharacterSet whitespaceAndNewlineCharacterSet] options:0 cutAfter:NO]) {
00059     if ([word isEqualToString:@""]) continue;
00060 
00061     BOOL forceWrap = NO;
00062     // If we start with newline
00063     if ([word rangeOfString:@"\n"].location == 0) {     
00064       word = [word substringFromIndex:1];
00065       forceWrap = ([line length] > 0); // Only wrap if we are not already on an empty line
00066     }
00067     
00068     CGSize size = [word sizeWithFont:font];
00069     if (size.height > maxLineHeight) maxLineHeight = size.height;
00070     
00071     // If word does not fit on current line
00072     if (x + size.width > width || forceWrap) {      
00073       if (lines) {
00074         
00075         BOOL hitMaxLineCount = (maxLineCount != -1 && ([wrappedLines count] + 1) >= maxLineCount);
00076         
00077         if (hitMaxLineCount) {          
00078           
00079           // If we are leaving some padding, then check and remove last 4 characters
00080           CGFloat paddingAmount = 50.0;
00081           NSInteger padCharacterCount = 4;
00082           if  (options & GHNSStringSizeTruncatePad == GHNSStringSizeTruncatePad) {
00083             if ((x + paddingAmount) > width) {
00084               if ([line length] > padCharacterCount) {
00085                 [line deleteCharactersInRange:NSMakeRange([line length] - padCharacterCount, padCharacterCount)];
00086               } else {
00087                 line = @"";
00088               }
00089             }
00090           }
00091             
00092           if  (options & GHNSStringSizeTruncateAddEllipsis == GHNSStringSizeTruncateAddEllipsis) [line appendString:@"â€¦"];
00093           
00094           if (truncated) *truncated = YES;
00095           // Line will be added at the end for us
00096           break;
00097         }
00098         
00099         [wrappedLines addObject:line];
00100         line = [NSMutableString string];
00101       }
00102       
00103       x = originX;
00104       y += maxLineHeight + lineGap;
00105       maxLineHeight = size.height; // On new line the maxLineHeight defaults to the first word
00106       
00107       // Strip leading white space for word, if we are on a new line
00108       word = [word gh_leftStrip];
00109       size = [word sizeWithFont:font];      
00110     }
00111     
00112     if (lines) {
00113       [line appendString:word];
00114     }   
00115     
00116     x += size.width;
00117     if (x > maxLineWidth) maxLineWidth = x;
00118   }
00119   
00120   if (lines) {
00121     if ([line length] > 0) [wrappedLines addObject:line];
00122     *lines = wrappedLines;
00123   }
00124   
00125   return CGSizeMake(maxLineWidth, y + maxLineHeight);
00126 }
00127 
00128 - (void)gh_drawAtCenter:(CGRect)rect withFont:(UIFont *)font lineBreakMode:(UILineBreakMode)lineBreakMode 
00129                 options:(GHNSStringDrawOptions)options {
00130   
00131   CGSize size = [self sizeWithFont:font forWidth:rect.size.width lineBreakMode:lineBreakMode];
00132   
00133   CGFloat x = rect.origin.x;
00134   CGFloat y = rect.origin.y;
00135   
00136   if (options == GHCenterHorizontal || options == GHCenterBoth) {
00137     CGFloat center = rect.size.width / 2.0 - size.width / 2.0;
00138     if (center >= 0) x += center;
00139   } 
00140   
00141   if (options == GHCenterVertical || options == GHCenterBoth) {
00142     CGFloat center = rect.size.height / 2.0 - size.height / 2.0;
00143     if (center >= 0) y += center;
00144   } 
00145   
00146   [self drawAtPoint:CGPointMake(x, y) forWidth:size.width withFont:font lineBreakMode:lineBreakMode]; 
00147 }
